education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Bachelor of Business Administration, Finance
details: Undergraduate Coursework: Machine Learning, Software Engineering, Database Management, Computer Architecture, Object-Oriented Programming, Artificial Intelligence, Statistical Computing.
Certifications & Awards: Dean's List, Intermediate iOS Development Certification (CodePath), AWS Cloud Practitioner Course, Web Development Bootcamp.

description: Collaborated with senior engineers to develop a full-stack internal microservice for managing payments data using Go, Vue.js, and MySQL.
Implemented PHP scripts to automate data management processes, enhancing operational efficiency.
Demonstrated proficiency in Agile workflow, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS development practices, Jenkins CI/CD processes, and testing procedures for efficient software delivery.
Executed data migrations and one-offs to deploy changes to MySQL database, resolving over 200 test cases for MySQL version update.
Collaborated with PhD candidates and professors to design the ConvoSense dataset aimed at improving common sense understanding within natural language processing.

Built a Conversational AI model based on a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) framework that effectively pulls information across 12K+ university websites and 50+ departments into a centralized platform for students and professors.

Constructing a submission to the 2024 North American Association of Computational Linguistics (NAACL) Conference on an LLM-based dynamic information extraction technique designed to enhance the personability of Conversational Agent interactions.
Reduced data collection costs by over 80% by building LLM-powered data generation pipelines to generate synthetic dialogues.

projects.name: Eagle Rating [Group Project]
description: Led a team of 5 in developing a full-stack web application platform where Emory students can provide ratings on campus places using Java Spring Boot and React.
Implemented search by tags and filtering functions, enabling efficient data querying from MongoDB database.
Utilized Docker to containerize the application, ensuring consistent operation across different environments and simplifying deployment processes.

projects.name: DQN Stock Trading Project [Independent]
description: Leveraged Python, TensorFlow, and Keras to create a Deep Q-Network (DQN) for automated stock trading.
Engineered a multi-stock trading environment with state representation, action space, and reward computation.
Utilized scikit-learn for data preprocessing and designed a custom neural network using Keras.

projects.name: BlogSmart [Group Project]
description: Directed a team of 4 in designing an iOS platform where users compose AI-assisted blogs, research papers, and editorials using OpenAI's GPT-3.5.
Introduced an AI-driven peer review system for enhanced content quality and originality.
Implemented CRUD functions using Parse Back4app DB to store users' blogs.

other.title: Skills
content: Languages: Python, Java, SQL, PHP, Go, JavaScript, CSS, R.
Technologies: Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins CI/CD, Jira, Node.js, React.js, MongoDB, AWS, Vue.js, Git.
